title: Frequently Asked Questions
subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about DetectivesGame

q1.question: What is DetectivesGame?
q1.answer: DetectivesGame is an interactive detective game where you solve exciting criminal cases. Investigate crime scenes, interrogate suspects and witnesses, analyze evidence, and find the perpetrator.

q2.question: How does the game work?
q2.answer: Choose a case, investigate the crime scene, collect evidence, conduct interrogations, and try to solve the case. You can submit a solution at any time and receive immediate feedback.

q3.question: Is the game free?
q3.answer: Yes! We offer free cases that you can play anytime. You can test the game without restrictions and decide later if you want to upgrade to Premium.

q1.question: What do I get as a free player?
q1.answer: As a free player, you have access to selected criminal cases, basic investigation tools, interrogations of suspects and witnesses, and all basic game features.

q2.question: Are there restrictions for free players?
q2.answer: Free players have access to a limited selection of cases and basic investigation tools. Premium cases and special features are reserved for Premium members.

q3.question: Can I upgrade to Premium later?
q3.answer: Yes, you can upgrade to Premium at any time and immediately access all Premium content. Your game progress will be preserved.

q1.question: How much does Premium cost?
q1.answer: The Premium membership costs only â‚¬4.99 per month. With this, you get access to all Premium cases, special investigation tools, and exclusive features.

q2.question: What do I get as a Premium member?
q2.answer: As a Premium member, you receive new exclusive Premium cases every month, access to special investigation tools like DNA analyses and autopsy reports, priority support, and early access to new features.

q3.question: Can I cancel Premium at any time?
q3.answer: Yes, you can cancel your Premium membership at any time. After cancellation, your access will continue until the end of the paid period and will then automatically end.

q1.question: How can I contact support?
q1.answer: You can reach us anytime via the contact form or email. Premium members receive priority support.

q2.question: Is there technical support?
q2.answer: Yes, our support team helps you with all technical questions and issues. Premium members receive faster response times.

q3.question: Where can I find more information?
q3.answer: You can find more information in our terms of service, privacy policy, or directly on our website.
